item.title: Clock Example
item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x
item.description:
@1337h4x wrote:

K, now make a JFrame, make a new class extending Canvas and add it to the JFrame. Make the Canvas repaint every 1000 ms. Make the canvas get the time and then draw it as an old-styke clock. (using Math.sin/Math.cos/Math.toRadians)

Read full topic

item.title: Clock Example
item.dc:creator: @Drunk_On_Java Drunk On Java
item.description:
@Drunk_On_Java wrote:

/********************************************
 *               Clock                      *
 *          By Goat Spirit                  *
 ********************************************/
 
import java.util.*;
import java.text.*;
 
 public class Clock {
 	public static void main(String[] Args) {
 		SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat("MMM dd hh:mm:ss yyyy");
    		String date = sdf.format(new Date());
    		System.out.println("Today's time is: " + date);
    	}
 }

Simple right?

Read full topic
